Welcome to the Falling Stars Roleplaying & Tactical Game System. This book describes a world for you, the players and Game Master, to build and tell your own stories in. Within the pages of this book you will find details about the future in which the game takes place.

Fifty years after first contact, the human race is beset by deadly machinations of several human factions as they struggle to extend their reach into the greater galaxy. A mysterious alien race has emerged whose ultimate intentions are as obscure as their origin. Each vies with the others to direct the future of our species among the stars and only you can determine the outcome.

So, grab between two and eight of your closest friends, get some refreshments, and get ready to dive into a world of adventure and intrigue, shaped by your own actions!

Features:
•Details for how to use the Opposed D10 system.
•Fully playable rules for over 20 Careers to develop your characters in.
•Rules to build and customize your own spaceship.
•A huge galaxy of planets and regions for your characters to explore.
•An immersing and realistic combat system that keeps players on both sides engaged.

216488.name: Falling Stars - Into the Long Dark Night (Module 1)
216488.description:
From the back of the book:
Welcome to ‘Into the Long Dark Night’, the first adventure module for the Falling Stars Roleplaying and Tactical Game.

This book will introduce you, the players, to the world of Falling Stars and lead you through a narrative story that is shaped and driven by the players. The story that is outlined here-in is just the skeleton of a narrative. It is up to you, the players, to fill in the connective tissue, skin, and effects that will make it a living, breathing entity all its own.

So, grab between two and eight of your closest friends, get some refreshments, and get ready to dive into a world of adventure and intrigue, shaped by your own actions.

216489.name: Crisis In The Caucasus: Struggle For Nagorno-Karabakh
216489.description:
Description from the publisher:

Crisis in the Caucasus: The Struggle For Nagorno-Karabakh is a game representing a modern day war between Armenia and Azerbaijan. The game takes 90-120 mins to play. This is the third release in the Modern Crisis Series. In this game we are releasing updated system rules that will include a new system for logistic management of your forces. This allows for more realistic gameplay as well as better representing the harassment of enemy supply lines during war.

The game is divided into game phases, such as movement, combat logistics, and the consolidation phase. The conclusion of these phases marks 1 game turn. This is a great intermediate war-game meant to bring new players to the hobby as well as being a challenging play for the veteran wargamer.

216490.description:
From Manufacturer:
Our Premium Magnetic Status Boards offer Mage Wars players a more robust way to keep track of their battle statistics during play. If you're looking for an alternative solution to the Core Set's cardboard status boards, or just looking to add more status boards to your play group, this is it! Each board provides magnetic pawns that mark your stats that help prevent shifting of cubes and values during the match if the boards are bumped or moved unexpectedly. Each board comes with 4 colored pawns for marking your Channel value, Mana Supply, Damage and Life. Each purchase is for one premium board.
216490.name: Mage Wars Arena: Premium Magnetic Status Board

216491.name: Friday the 13th: The Game
216491.description:
Friday the 13th: The Game will be a semi-open world third-person survival horror game set in the fictional camp of Crystal Lake in the Friday the 13th franchise. The time period is set in the events of the 1980 movie.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friday_the_13th%3A_The_Game Friday the 13th: The Game]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

216492.name: Weird creatures
216492.description:
User Summary

You will travel across forests, deserts and snowy mountains, accompanied by a powerful ally vehicle to care of.

216493.description:
SoulHunt is a ‘Hide ‘n Seek’ multiplayer game.

Source: The Game Website.

216497.name: Throne and the Grail
boardgamepublisher: 大気圏内ゲームズ (Taikikennai Games)
216497.description:
The king no longer has extra life expectancy.
In preparation for the time to come, the two next king candidates were trying to gather support from various forces in various places.
But do not disturb yourself.
No matter how many voices you put on your side, you just bow down to the person who carries the Holy Grail ... ...

"Holy Grail Succession" is a card game for two people with the theme of medieval throne succession fighting.
The player becomes one of the influential throne successors, and will aim at the throne.
Those who gained the support of many forces are approved by the princes and become the next king.

216498.name: Murders & Acquisitions Employee Manual
216498.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Murders & Acquisitions Roleplaying Game puts you smack dab in the middle of a cut-throat corporation in an absurd, alternate version of our world where literally anything goes in terms of corporate advancement.

You portray an employee seeking power, prestige, and wealth…at any cost. You’ll sabotage your rivals’ pet projects, destroy them at social events, steal their secrets, or even kill them and cover it all up. In the process, you’ll rise up the ranks, make new enemies, and discover new goals.

216499.name: Murders & Acquisitions Supervisor Screen
216499.description:
From publisher blurb:

A two page summary of key rules and information that the Supervisor (GM) should have quick access to at all times. Portrait and landscape variations.

216500.name: Murders & Acquisitions Employee Rules
216500.description:
From publisher blurb:

A summary of the basic rules of the Murders & Acquisitions RPG. Perfect for new players or as a quick reference.
